segments.text: I see a woman, seemingly content, drying a plate in front of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunlight streams through the open window, illuminating the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, I can't help but notice the water spilling over the edge of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is already submerged in the puddle, but she remains oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dishes pile up on the counter, a testament to her busy life.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden looks serene, which makes the chaos inside feel more jarring.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how she doesn't notice the mess around her.
segments.speaker: PAR
